ygData.subject: Re: RE: Re: [EverQuest] New expansion Beta Open
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t been able to get on much either so I don t know. I do know they have added veterans awards so that if you ve played for a certain amount of time you
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't been able to get on much either so I don't know. I do know they have added veterans awards so that if you've played for a certain amount of time you get bonus features. I think my favorite is an AA that lets you get double xp for about 30min once a day.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-08-08, 13:58:00 you wrote: =======

>Hey all I was just wondering how much Everquest has changed since November

>deployment and have no internet access.
